## SolidLineMaterial.outlineColor property

Outline color.

 The width of outline (\[\[outlineWidth\]\]) need to be also set to enable outlining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get outlineColor(): THREE.Color;

set outlineColor(value: THREE.Color);
```
